mdRecord.dcterms:title: Group of visitors at Home of Washington, Mount Vernon, Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dillon, Luke C., 1836-1904
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Photograph of visitors on the east lawn. The group is largely made up of Mason's wearing aprons, collars and ribbons. Photograph taken by 'official photographer to the Association' Luke C. Dillon. The photograph has been pasted to a cardboard mount. Printed on the mount is Dillon's gallery address - Office, 935 Penn. Avenue, Pullman's Gallery, Washington D. C. - where visitors could order photographs. Reverse of the photograph indicates the picture was taken 'Aug. 6 - 2 (group 2).'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Freemasonry
